searchDocs.title: LoadingModules​
searchDocs.content: </> hydrogen.LoadingModules: Instance  The instance that is holding all the module scripts to be required within.

searchDocs.title: AddModules​
searchDocs.content: </> hydrogen:AddModules( ModuleHolder: Instance -- The instance that is holding all the module scripts to be required within. ) → () Sets up hydrogen by creating tables to store Modules.

searchDocs.title: LoadModule​
searchDocs.content: </> hydrogen:LoadModule( Module: ModuleScript -- The module script to be required ) → () Runs a pcall to require.

searchDocs.title: LoadModules​
searchDocs.content: </> hydrogen:LoadModules() → () Requires all descendants of LoadingModules and initialize the module via :LoadModule().
